sentences.sContent: The reflected glare may also cause underexposure. Take pictures at an angle to shiny surfaces to minimize flash reflections.
sentences.sContent_eng: The reflected glare may also cause underexposure. Take pictures at an angle to shiny surfaces to minimize flash reflections.
sentences.sCn: 反光还会造成景物曝光不足。因此拍摄时，请与光亮背景保持一定角度，以减少闪光的反射影响。

sentences.sContent: Small moments with bad hair, messy backgrounds, dirty faces, overexposure, underexposure, red eyes, goofy faces – they are all part of this imperfect, messy life we live.
sentences.sContent_eng: Small moments with bad hair, messy backgrounds, dirty faces, overexposure, underexposure, red eyes, goofy faces – they are all part of this imperfect, messy life we live.
sentences.sCn: 那些镜头里糟糕的发型，一团乱麻的背景，脏脏的脸，曝光过度，曝光不足，红眼，呆呆的表情——都是不完美的一部分，我们混乱生活的一部分。
